de.mrapp.android.dialog.decorator

Class AnimateableDialogDecorator

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.dialog.decorator.AbstractDialogDecorator<HeaderDialog>
      • de.mrapp.android.dialog.decorator.AnimateableDialogDecorator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AnimateableDialogDecorator, Dialog, DialogDecorator

    public class AnimateableDialogDecorator
extends AbstractDialogDecorator<HeaderDialog>
implements AnimateableDialogDecorator
    A decorator, which allows to modify the view hierarchy of an animateable dialog, which is designed according to Android 5's Material Design guidelines even on pre-Lollipop devices and may contain a header.
    Since:
    4.0.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface de.mrapp.android.dialog.model.Dialog

        Dialog.Gravity

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface de.mrapp.android.dialog.model.Dialog

        MATCH_PARENT, WRAP_CONTENT

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AnimateableDialogDecorator(HeaderDialog dialog)
      Creates a new decorator, which allows to modify the view hierarchy of an animateable dialog, which is designed according to Android 5's Material design guidelines even on pre-Lollipop devices.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AnimateableDialogDecorator

        public AnimateableDialogDecorator(@NonNull
                                  HeaderDialog dialog)
        Creates a new decorator, which allows to modify the view hierarchy of an animateable dialog, which is designed according to Android 5's Material design guidelines even on pre-Lollipop devices.
        Parameters:
        dialog - The dialog, whose view hierarchy should be modified by the decorator, as an instance of the type HeaderDialog. The dialog may not be null

    • Method Detail

      • showAnimated

        public final boolean showAnimated(@Nullable
                                  DialogAnimation animation,
                                  @Nullable
                                  android.animation.Animator.AnimatorListener listener)
        Shows the dialog in an animated manner, according to a specific animation.
        Parameters:
        animation - The animation, which should be used, as an instance of the class DialogAnimation or null, if no animation should be used
        listener - The listener, which should be notified about the animation's events, as an instance of the type Animator.AnimatorListener or null, if no listener should be notified
        Returns:
        True, if the dialog has been shown in an animated manner, false otherwise

      • hideAnimated

        public final boolean hideAnimated(@Nullable
                                  DialogAnimation animation,
                                  @Nullable
                                  android.animation.Animator.AnimatorListener listener)
        Hides the dialog in an animated manner, according to a specific animation.
        Parameters:
        animation - The animation, which should be used, as an instance of the class DialogAnimation or null, if no animation should be used
        listener - The listener, which should be notified about the animation's events, as an instance of the type Animator.AnimatorListener or null, if no listener should be notified
        Returns:
        True, if the dialog has been hidden in an animated manner, false otherwise
